arStrings.szText: {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} is now a {c_important}Shout{/c} Skill and increases Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c}. In addition, {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} also affects Nearby Players for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Blood Howl{/c} increases Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c} and affects Companions and Players.
